name: Bites
overview:
Bites is a second screen companion app that enhances live television viewing by delivering a more interactive content and social experience. With Bites, viewers can “play along” with the broadcast and compete with friends and other fans in real time.

As the action unfolds during sporting events, reality shows, and other live programs, Bites allows viewers to:

★ Compete against friends by answering trivia and predicting how the action will unfold

★ Collect points and win prizes during the event based on performance

★ Share opinions by rating performances and participating in live polls

★ Purchase items displayed on screen in real time

★ Chat live with friends other viewers while watching the event

★ And with its patent-pending technology, viewers can instantly alert their friends and the world when something amazing or shocking happens by creating an OMG Moment™
